title: No children node listing when changing data source for a data set in data set editor page of the query tab
description: No children node listing when changing data source for a data set in data set editor page of the query tab.
OB: When changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab, there is no children node listing.
EB: When changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab, the children node listing should be displayed.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Create a new data set without an SQL statement. 
2. Open the data set editor and go to the data source page. 
3. Change the data source to a new one. 

Expected result: The children node listing should be displayed. 

If the issue persists, close the data set editor and reopen it to see if the problem is resolved.
